wikipedia_page.main: Sir Roger Williams is a Welsh academic. He was vice-chancellor of the University of Reading from 1993 until 2002, and chair of Higher Education Funding Council for Wales from 2002 to 2008. He received a knighthood in June 2006 for his services to Higher Education.Roger Williams was born in South Wales and grew up near Merthyr Tydfil, where he was educated at Tredegar Grammar School. He continued his studies at Worcester College, Oxford, where he became an Honorary Fellow in 1999.

response: Roger Williams (1603–1683) was an English theologian and co-founder of Rhode Island.

#REDIRECT Roger Williams (professor)

By 1989, SPSG had become a non-profit company, registered as a charity, by taking over the shell of the Technical Change Centre, an earlier cross-Research Council initiative. The SPSG Board was chaired by Professor David Edge (1989–1992), Professor (later Sir) Roger Williams (1992–1998) and Sir Ian Lloyd MP (1998–2003). The first director of SPSG was Professor John Ziman, FRS and the programme manager Peter Healey, who became managing director in 1993.
